mapper.select: WITH USR AS ( SELECT USR_ID , USR_TYPE FROM TB_USER USR WHERE USR_ID = #{usr_id} ), CCD AS ( SELECT CCD_SEQ , CCD_CODE , CCD_GROUP , CCD_CODENAME , CCD_DETAIL1 , CCD_DETAIL2 , CCD_DETAIL3 , CCD_NOTE , CCD_ORDER , CCD_USEYN FROM TB_COMMON_CODE WHERE CCD_GROUP = 'menu_permission' ) SELECT CCD_CODE , CCD_CODENAME , CCD_NOTE FROM CCD, USR WHERE USR_TYPE IN (CCD_DETAIL1, CCD_DETAIL2, CCD_DETAIL3) ORDER BY CCD_ORDER ASC
SELECT CCD_CODE , CCD_CODENAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE WHERE CCD_GROUP = #{ccd_group} ORDER BY CCD_ORDER

SELECT CCD_CODE , CCD_CODENAME
, CCD_GROUP , CCD_DETAIL1 , CCD_DETAIL2 , CCD_DETAIL3 , CCD_NOTE , CCD_ORDER
FROM TB_COMMON_CODE WHERE CCD_GROUP = #{ccd.ccd_group} AND CCD_CODENAME LIKE '%'||#{ccd.ccd_codename}||'%' ORDER BY CCD_ORDER

SELECT U.USR_ID , U.USR_NAME
, U.USR_IMAGE , U.USR_EMAIL , U.USR_SMS , U.USR_KAKAO , U.USR_ACTIVE , CC2.CCD_CODENAME AS USR_ACTIVE_CODE , U.USR_QUESTION , CC.CCD_CODENAME AS USR_QUESTION_CODE , U.USR_ANSWER , U.USR_TYPE , CC3.CCD_CODENAME AS USR_TYPE_CODE
FROM TB_USER U
, TB_COMMON_CODE CC , TB_COMMON_CODE CC2 , TB_COMMON_CODE CC3
WHERE U.USR_NAME LIKE '%'||#{usr_name}||'%'
AND U.USR_QUESTION = CC.CCD_CODE AND U.USR_ACTIVE = CC2.CCD_CODE AND U.USR_TYPE = CC3.CCD_CODE

SELECT I.ITM_ID , I.ITM_NAME
, I.ITM_TYPE , CC.CCD_CODENAME AS ITM_TYPE_CODE , I.ITM_OWNER , U.USR_NAME AS ITM_OWNER_NAME , I.ITM_MAINITEM , SUB_I.ITM_NAME AS ITM_MAINITEM_NAME , I.ITM_NOTE , I.ITM_IMAGE , I.ITM_USEYN , CC2.CCD_CODENAME AS ITM_USEYN_CODE
FROM TB_ITEM I
, TB_COMMON_CODE CC , TB_COMMON_CODE CC2 , TB_USER U , TB_ITEM SUB_I
WHERE I.ITM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{itm_name}||'%'
AND I.ITM_TYPE = CC.CCD_CODENAME AND U.ITM_OWNER = U.USR_ID AND U.ITM_USEYN = CC2.CCD_CODENAME AND I.ITM_ID = SUB_I.ITM_ID
